list_definition.definition: (the act of making) a successful, violent attempt to change or remove a government etc
a complete change in ideas, methods etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s been a complete revolution in the way things are done in this office.

list_definition.definition: a complete circle or turn round a central point, axis etc (eg as made by a record turning on a record-player, or the Earth moving on its axis or round the Sun).
